name: Call of Balls
description:
A game about destroying evil cubes by cute little balls!

  • Shoot the cubes by touching or clicking the screen, avoid shooting the bombs!
  • Shoot them before they reach the red line! watch your health bar!
  • Collect power-ups to change your ball type and shoot more effectively, each power-up is unique and must be used carefully;
    • Purple: Click and hold to shoot balls automatically
    • Red: Click to shoot then click again to explode into little balls shooting different angles
    • Yellow: Big, Slow and yet effective ball which destroys anything in its path
    • Blue: Click to shoot 3 balls at different angles
    • Reflector: Your balls will bounce off walls and other cubes

Get 5000 points for a Boss Fight!

Instructions:

  • Use your left mouse click or touch screen to shoot.
  • Press Escape to exit the game at anytime
